comments.comments_text: Ajax failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: The resulting set piece from PAOK is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.

comments.comments_text: Diego Biseswar (PAOK) scores! He latches on to a pass and produces a perfect strike from the edge of the box that goes inside the left post and past the goalkeeper.

comments.comments_text: Tempers flare after a clattering challenge by Lisandro Martinez (Ajax), who receives a yellow card from the referee. It could have been worse for him!
